咡字的基本解释

咡
èr
口旁，口耳之间：“负剑辟咡诏之。”
蚕吐丝，引申为以丝作琴弦。
古同“饵（噐 ）”。

咡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［èr］
［《廣韻》仍吏切，去志，日。］
［《廣韻》如之切，平之，日。］
(1)口旁；口耳之间。
(2)蚕吐丝。引申为以丝作琴弦。
(3)通“餌”。

咡字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　咡； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页186第01
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?仍吏切，音餌。【廣韻】口吻也。【禮·曲禮】負劒，辟咡詔之。【註】辟咡詔之，謂傾頭與語也。口旁曰咡。【疏】管子弟子職云：食已，循咡覆手。謂弟子食訖，以手循覆於咡，故知是口旁也。【釋文】口耳之閒曰咡。又【少儀】有問焉，則辟咡而對。　又【集韻】人之切，音而。與㖇同。詳後㖇字註。

咡
Basic explanation of words
咡
èr
By the side of the mouth, between the mouth and the ear: "The negative sword is the edict."
Silkworm spinning, by extension, uses silk as strings.
Gu Tong "bait (噐)".
咡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [èr]
["Guangyun" is still cutting, go to the record, day. ]
["Guangyun" is like cut, flat, day. ]
(1) By the mouth; between the mouth and ears.
(2) Silkworm spinning. The extension is to use silk as strings.
(3) Through "bait".

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　咡; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 186 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Still cutting, sound bait. [Guang Yun] The tone is also. 【Rite·Music Ceremony】Negative quotation, quotation of quotation. [Note] Pisi Zhaozhi means that the head is turned and the language is also spoken. Said by the side of the mouth. [Shu] Guan Zi's disciple Zhiyun: After eating, I will cover my hands. It is said that the disciple eats and circulates in the 咡 with his hands, so I know it is also by the mouth. 【Explanation】Talking about talking and listening to the word 咡. Also [Shao Yi] If you have a question, you will be right.　[Jiyun] The cut of people, the sound. Same as 㖇. Note to the words after the details.
